channel.title: How do i run my server?
channel.description: i made my ip, website and every thing else but i dunno how to get it online, can some 1 pls help?

item.title: How do i run my server?
item.dc:creator: @CrazzMc750i CrazzMc750i
item.description:
@CrazzMc750i wrote:

on a tut on this site it says use default ip adress but it wouldnt work when i go to router settings it says you cannot use same address as LAN address help me :x!?!? ty

item.title: How do i run my server?
item.dc:creator: @Jpark Jpark
item.description:
@Jpark wrote:

ty, hope this works.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 14, 2008, 06:02:02 pm[/size][hr]err, how do i know whats the ip and port, liek the ip, the servers name? :S:S:S:S:

Read full topic
item.source: How do i run my server?

item.title: How do i run my server?
item.dc:creator: @D_U_T_C_H_Y D U T C H Y
item.description:
@D_U_T_C_H_Y wrote:

follow tutorials, dude.

well, i will explain it in short. uhm, just go to your firewall and go to “add a port”. then put at the port the server name (without the .no-ip.(org or biz or w.e). so if had make a server like blabla.no-ip.org, then just pit blabla. uhm then add the server port. then it will be onnline (dont forget too click at the square on the no-ip progam. the face will be just sad for a few seconds and after that it will be a hapy face. then it will be onnline, uhh, your server. this was my short explain

Read full topic
